channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Crimewatch Live
channel.desc: Antiterrorism police hunt for a man believed to be inciting harm, and 75-year-old John Murray was fatally assaulted at his home in London in October 2024 - can you help solve his murder?

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Politics Live
channel.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.
